mapper.insert: insert into rbbs(rnum, id, title, content, rdate, fname, rcount,imp) values((SELECT NVL(MAX(rnum),0) + 1 as rnum FROM rbbs), #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{fname}, #{rcount},#{imp})
mapper.update: update rbbs set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, fname=#{fname}, rdate=sysdate where rnum=#{rnum}
mapper.select:
select count(*) as cnt from rbbs
wname like '%' || #{word}||'%'
title like '%' || #{title}||'%'
content like '%' || #{content} || '%'
